DOC.brief_summary: This open-label, randomized, two-period, two-treatment (single doses of 10 mg SHR3824 fasted or fed), crossover study was conducted to evaluate the effect of a high-fat meal on the pharmacokinetics of SHR3824 and mass balance study in 12 healthy subjects.
DOC.brief_title: Effect of a High-fat Meal on the Pharmacokinetics of SHR3824 and Mass Balance Study in Healthy Subjects
DOC.criteria: Healthy. BMI 1825 kg/m2. History of clinically significant illness. History of alcohol or drug abuse.
